messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Fwd: Japanese XVIII Century Sword For Sale--FOR CRYING OUT LOUD, IT'S A SCAM
messages.msgSnippet: ... PEOPLE, PLEASE! This guy has been around for several years--every so often he comes back and tries his luck again. HE S A SCAM ARTIST. DO NOT WASTE YOUR
messages.messageBody:
--- Daniel Cooper <danielcooper@...> wrote:
> Kee Curlee wrote:
>
> >
> > Guys, This bum has sent me pictures, paper work,
> all kinds of
> > documentation
> > and etc. now, I asked him to send the sword for
> inspection, now the
> > game
> > gets bad. He tells me he needs money to send the
> sword for inspection,
>
> If the item is as he said, I would probably do the
> same thing. It would
> keep it from being a total lost if it was sent to
> someone who did not
> return it. Over the internet you do not know who
> you are dealing with.
>
> Of course, the important word is IF.
>
> Dan Cooper

PEOPLE, PLEASE!

This guy has been around for several years--every so
often he comes back and tries his luck again. HE'S A
SCAM ARTIST. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME EMAILING HIM! As
CEPO said, he's baaack....when someone posts that, it
should be a clue to you that we've dealt with him
before. Anyone stop to think why he emailed you
individually? It's because he CANNOT post on the
list--us moderator types will immediately delete his
email and ban him, AGAIN.

Quit wasting your time with him.

Nate
